bio: Gabriella Martinez is a contemporary painter from Barcelona, specializing in cubist and geometric abstraction. Her work deconstructs forms and spaces, creating dynamic compositions that challenge traditional perspectives. She has been a key figure in the Spanish contemporary art scene.

media.videoPost: Deconstructing forms and spaces in my Barcelona studio. Cubism teaches us to see from multiple perspectives simultaneously. Breaking down reality into geometric shapes and reassembling them into new visual languages. #Cubism #GeometricArt #BarcelonaArtist
